entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Rogersville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:33 AM AST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Miramichi 09:00 AM AST Thursday 26 January 2023
Temperature: -3.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.5 kPa falling
Humidity: 95 %
Wind Chill: -11
Dewpoint: -4.0°C
Wind: ENE 27 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Snow at times heavy or rain. High 6.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy changing to rain this afternoon. Risk of freezing rain late this morning. Blowing snow late this morning. Snowfall amount 15 cm. Rainfall amount 10 mm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southeast 50 gusting to 80 late this morning. High 6. Wind chill minus 15 this morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Rain ending this evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Becoming partly cloudy before morning. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 5.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 19 except minus 24 in low lying areas.
